description:
Get the most out of your Gold Camp UL 3 Tarp with the accessory mesh inner body. Exterior toggles easily attach to your tarp for bug protection and better stability.

  • Tear resistant polyester ripstop floor with a waterproof polyurethane coating
  • Mesh canopy can be suspended by the peak loop or supported by a centre pole (sold separately)
  • Single door has dual zippers with easy-grip zipper pulls
  • Square base with cut off corner creates a spacious vestibule when paired with Gold Camp Tarp UL 3 Tarp
  • Toggles on the outer mesh allows for easy integration with the Gold Camp UL 3 Tarp for a waterproof shelter. (sold separately)
  • Multiple interior loops for attaching gear lofts and mtnGLO® accessory lights. (sold separately)
name: Big Agnes Gold Camp UL 3-Person Mesh Inner
